title: document how to use spec['foo'].headers.cpp_flags and alike
body:
`LibraryList` class is mentioned in PackagingGuide. We should also mention how to use [HeaderList](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/llnl.util.html?highlight=cpp_flags#llnl.util.filesystem.HeaderList).

Here are a few examples:

```
$ ag "cpp_flags" var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/
var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/abinit/package.py
152:            'with_libxc_incs={0}'.format(libxc.headers.cpp_flags),
164:                '--with-netcdf-incs={0}'.format(netcdff.headers.cpp_flags),

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cp2k/package.py
98:                spec['fftw'].headers.cpp_flags
115:                spec['fftw'].headers.cpp_flags
193:                    # spec['elpa:fortran'].headers.cpp_flags
200:                    # spec[pexsi:fortran].headers.cpp_flags

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/environment-modules/package.py
62:        cpp_flags = ['-DUSE_INTERP_ERRORLINE']
77:            'CPPFLAGS=' + ' '.join(cpp_flags)

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hdf5/package.py
267:            cc(*(['-c', "check.c"] + spec['hdf5'].headers.cpp_flags.split()))

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/openblas/package.py
194:        include_flags = spec['openblas'].headers.cpp_flags

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/pocl/package.py
107:            cflags = spec["pocl"].headers.cpp_flags.split()

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/superlu-dist/package.py
77:                spec['parmetis'].headers.cpp_flags,
78:                spec['metis'].headers.cpp_flags,
```
